GSD.product_version: versions from v3.14 to before v4.9.331
GSD.description:
drm/mipi-dsi: Detach devices when removing the host

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.331 by commit c202cda08cd5693645d4990ad1eb2e8068a884ec, it was introduced in version v3.14 by commit 068a00233969833f1ba925e7627797489efd6041. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: drm/mipi-dsi: Detach devices when removing the host
